MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK11 postcode area of Menstrie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:35pm due to an unsafe underground cable outside 42 Broompark East and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:52pm on Monday, 11 January 2021
